attributes.action: Trigger a parliamentary vote of no confidence in the labour government.
attributes.additional_details: We,the undersigned.Declare that we have no confidence in the current labour government.we believe it has failed to provide competent and accountable leadership, mis managed key national issues, and has lost the trust of the British people.We call on members of parliament to bring forward and support a formal motion of no confidence in His Majesty’s Government,and on the prime minister to recognise this loss of public confidence by seeking a renewed democratic mandate through a general election.
attributes.background: The labour government has failed to deliver on key election promises,broken public trust and not acted on its mandate.Parliament must hold it accountabe through a vote of no confidence and allow the public to decide the nations leadership in a general election.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

Call an immediate general election

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
